thread.title: Trendy Hotel in a Good location
thread.title_full: Trendy Hotel in a Good location - Review of hub by Premier Inn Spitalfields, Brick Lane, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ANGE461
title: Trendy Hotel in a Good location
text: Trendy Hotel in a Good location near Spittlefield market . Easy self check in and out. The rooms are small but clean and very comfy bed. The technology in the room is very easy to use. Convenient for Liverpool Street, East Aldgate and Whitechapel Tube stations. The area is trendy with lots of eating places. I recommend Poppies for fish and chips.
